title: Hecarim's "E" Devestating Charge
body: Turrets are now immune to this ability? Just spent a whole game using it with no damage? I assume I missed this in one of the patch notes. It has also been quite a while since I've player Hec.

replies.body:
They recently changed it so that his E no longer ignores unit collision so they might have made an error, you should send a message in to help and support if it's not dealing damage to turrets - it could also be a failure to mention it in notes but it's worth mentioning to help and support.

(Or you can post it here http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).

> [{quoted}](name=Nya Hop,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Wa7nMQEY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-08T06:52:37.516+0000)
>
> They recently changed it so that his E no longer ignores unit collision so they might have made an error, you should send a message in to help and support if it's not dealing damage to turrets - it could also be a failure to mention it in notes but it's worth mentioning to help and support.
> 
> (Or you can post it here http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).

Yup raised a support ticket also posted it on NA bug report cheers.
